Package org.skistation.services

Class PriceListService

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.services.PriceListService
@Service public class PriceListService extends Object
Represents a price list service class. It provides methods to perform operations on the price list table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new price list service with the specified price list repository.

  • Method Details

    • getPriceListById

      public Optional<PriceList> getPriceListById(Integer id)
      Retrieves a price list by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the price list to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the price list if found, or an empty Optional if not

    • updatePriceList

      public Optional<PriceList> updatePriceList(PriceList priceList)
      Modifies a price list in the database.
      Parameters:
      priceList - the price list to modify
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the modified price list if found, or an empty Optional if not

      Returns:
      the saved price list

      Parameters:

    • getAllPriceLists

    • getPriceListWithinTimeRange

      public List<PriceList> getPriceListWithinTimeRange(LocalDate timeNow)
      Retrieves all price lists within a specified time range from the database.
      Parameters:
      timeNow - the current time
      Returns:
      a list of all price lists within the specified time range
